title: Other heavy for gestational age infants
chapter: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
block: Disorders related to length of gestation and fetal growth
category: Disorders related to long gestation and high birth weight
inclusion: conditions that have their origin in the perinatal period even though death or morbidity occurs later
the listed conditions, without further specification, as causes of mortality, morbidity or additional care, in fetus or newborn
Other fetus or infant heavy- or large-for-dates regardless of period of gestation.
exclusion: congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
syndrome of infant of: diabetic mother
syndrome of infant of: mother with gestational diabetes
syndrome of infant of: Birth weight of 4500 g or more
